title: URF's disabled cousin is back
body:
Tired of matches being decided at champ select. Even if my team is winning I don't have fun most of the time because i'm stuck with a champ that is bad or I don't know how to play. I understand that some people who are dead on the inside don't like people having fun, which is why just like last time I suggest that URF mode is released with the option to pick between URF mode and ARURF.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
ARAM is always available, URF should not be random.

Actually, they should do blind pick URF on rift, and random URF on the abyss.
